chapter.text: Alm
Day $ilen imdanen a ten ooen qqaoen: "numen", u nitni ur ppuhewwlen
Ni$ Nhewwel wid i ten id izwaren. War ccekk, ad Yissin Oebbi wid iqqaoen tidep, ad Yissin ikeddaben
Ne$ $ilen ad a£ zwiren wid ixedmen tucmitin? Dir it wayen peuddun
Win iggunin timlilit akked Oebbi, s tidep, a d ias, war ccekk, lajel n Oebbi. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Win ijuhden, ijuhed kan i iman is. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iewao ara imavalen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, ad asen Nekkes tucmitin nnsen, a ten Nkafi $ef wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Nweuua amdan ar lewqama, s imawlan is. Ma lezmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen ppa$ awal. Tu$alin nnwen, $uoI. Ad awen Mle$ acu txeddmem
Wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, a ten Nessekcem ar iaaoviyen

Ger imdanen, wid iqqaoen: "numen s Oebbi". Ma meenen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad eesben ahewwel n medden, d aaaqeb n Oebbi. Mi d iusa l$elb, s$uo Mass ik, ar ad inin: "ih, nella yidwen". Day ur Ieoa ara Oebbi, i illan deg idmaren imavalen
War ccekk, Oebbi Issen wid iumnen, Issen ixabiten
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "ddut d ubrid nne$, a nbibb tuccva nnwen". Nitni ur pbibbin acemma, si tuccva nnsen. S tidep, nitni d ikeddaben
War ccekk, ad bibben tiaekkwmin nnsen, akked tiaekkwmin nniven. Ih, ad ppusteqsin, ass n tnekra, af wayen id snulfuyen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue, i ugdud is. Izde$ yides, agim kkes ed smuset iseggwasen. Ibbwi ten ueemmal, nitni d imednas
Nsellek it, neppa akked wid iddan di lbabuo. Nerra t d assekni i imavalen
Iboahim, mi inna i ugdud is: "aabdet Oebbi, eezzbet aS. Yif it wakka, i kunwi, lemmer teeoim
Taabdem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Tesnulfam d tikerkas. Ih, wid taabdem, war Oebbi, ur zmiren a kwen $iten. Ssutret l$it i Oebbi, aabdet eP, snemmret aS. £uoeS ara tu$alem
Ma tnekoem, ihi, uqbel nnwen, nekoen leoyus". I iwatan, i umazan, siwa assiwev ubeggen
Day ur walan ara, amek id Inezzu Oebbi lxelq, sinna, Ippales as. Ih, ayagi, i Oebbi, d ushil
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek id Inza lxelq. Sinna, Oebbi a d Iawi lxelq aneggaru. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ikkat win i S ihwan; Ipeunu $ef win i S ihwan. £ureS jebbu nnwen
Ur tesfunnugem, kunwi, di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni. Ur tesaim, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
Wid iugin issekniyen n Oebbi, akked temlilit yideS, widak ad aysen aeunu W. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "en$et ep, ne$ sseo$et ep". Isellek it Oebbi, si tmes. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i ugdud iumnen
Inna: "teddmem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Temeemmalem di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, ass n tnekra, kra degwen ad nekoen wiyav, kra ad xzun wiyav. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi usellak
Iumen it Lui. Inna: "nek, d iminig ar Mass iw. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
N$at it s Iseaq akked Yaaqub. I tarwas, Nefka lambiyya, Tazmamt. Nefka yas taqviat is, di ddunit; u neppa, di laxeot, war ccekk, seg iaaoviyen
Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "ih, aql akwen la txedmem laao, ur ixdim yiwen, zik, deg imavalen
La teppeddum, ih, ar irgazen, tgezzmem abrid, txeddmem ayen icemten, deg igrawen nnwen". Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi nnan: "awi a$ d aaaqeb n Oebbi, ma telliv seg wid issawalen tidep
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi afus, mgal agdud ifessaden
Mi d usan imceggaen nne£, ar Iboahim, s ubecceo, nnan as: "ih, a Nesqucc imezda$ n temdint agi. Imezda$ is, s tidep, d imednas
Inna d: "ni$ degs Lui". Nnan as: "Nekwni, Neeoa sennig akw, i illan degs. A t Naateq, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, ara yilin seg wid igwran
Mi usan imceggaen nne£, ar Lui, i$wbel ilmend nnsen, ur izmir a ten ifukk. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad, ur $webbel. Nekwni a k Naateq, kecc d twacult ik, siwa tameiiut ik, ara yilin seg wid igwran
Ih, nekwni a d Nesse$li ssxev seg igenni, $ef imezda$ n temdint agi, ilmend n laao nnsen
Ni$ Neooa d segs, assekni iberrzen, i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Ar Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi, gganit ass aneggaru, ur oouout di tmurt d ifessaden
Nekoen t. Tewwet iten zzenzla. Gwran d, d loeppat, deg ixxamen nnsen
Aad akked Tamud - ni$ iban awen d seg ixxamen nnsen -, icebbee asen Cciian igiten nnsen. Issuffe$ iten seg ubrid, nitni pfeooioen
Qaoun, Feraun, Haman, ni$ iusa ten id Musa, s ubeggen. Sme$woen iman nnsen, di tmurt, ur rbieen
Yal wa, Newwet it $ef ubekkav is. Llan wid iwumi Nuzen tabucivant. Llan wid i iwwet usu$u. Llan wid i Nger seddaw wakal. Llan wid i Ne$meq. Macci d Oebbi iten idensen, d nitni i idensen iman nnsen
Wid iteddun d imawlan, war Oebbi, cban rtila. Tebna tissist. Ihi, axxam ahcican mavi, d tissist n rtila, lemmer ssinen
Ih, Oebbi Ieoa akw ayen u$uo naaoen, war Neppa. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Imedyaten agi, Neppawi ten id, i l$aci. Siwa imusnawen ara ten ifehmen
Ixleq Oebbi tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ih, deg waya, assekni i lmumnin
Mel ayen i k id ippuweeean si Tezmamt. Bedd i teallit. Ih, taeallit teppekkes laao, tuccva. War ccek, iugar ip usmekti n Oebbi. Oebbi Ieoa acu tuenaam
Ur pnamaret At Tezmamt, siwa s wawal aeidan, siwa wid degsen idensen. Init: "numen s wayen id irsen $uone$, id irsen $uowen. Oebbi nne$, akked Oebbi nnwen, Yiwen. Nekwni $uoeS d imvuaen
Akka ay ed Nessers, $uoek, Tazmamt. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, umnen yis. Ger wigi, kra umnen yis. I inekoen issekniyen nne£, siwa ijehliyen
Ur telliv temmalev kra n Tezmamt, uqbel tagi; ur p tepparuv, s uyeffus ik. Yili ad cukken inekkaoen
Xaii, neppa d issekniyen iberrzen, deg idmaren n wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni. Siwa imednas, i inekoen issekniyen nne£
Nnan: "a lemmer id rsen fellas, issekniyen s$uo Mass is"! Ini: "issekniyen ar Oebbi kan. Nek, d aneddao kan, ipbegginen
Ne$, ur steqnaaen ara s trusi $uoek, s$uone£, n Tezmamt, malen asen p. Deg waya, s tidep, aeunu, akked usmekti i ugdud iumnen
Ini: "Iqadd Oebbi, d anagi gari yidwen. Issen i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid iumnen di tkerkas, u ugin Oebbi, widak d imexsuoen
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Lemmer macci d lajel ipwassnen, a ten id ias uaaqeb. Ih, a ten id ias, deqzalla, ur bnin
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Ih, Loahennama a ppezzi i ijehliyen
Ass ideg ar asen isbur uaaqeb, sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaoen nnsen, ad Yini: "jeoobet ayen txeddmem
A yimdanen iW iumnen, ni$ tamurt iW tewsaa. Ihi, aabdet iyI, Nek
Yal iman, ad ijeooeb tameppant; sinna, $uone£ a d tu$alem
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad asen Nerr tanezdu$t di Loennet m t$uofatin, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, degs ad wekkoen. D asaadi warraz n wid ixedmen lxio
wid iueboen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Aceal n leweuc, ur d neppawi ooeeq nnsen. Oebbi Ioeeq iten, u Ioeeq ikwen. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i Inuben s yiiij akked waggur"? A d inin, war ccekk: "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi wexxoen
Oebbi Issugut l$it i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u Iwezzen as. Ih, Oebbi Issen yal cci
Ma testequav ten: "anwa id Isse$layen aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is"? A d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur fhimen
Tameddurt agi, di ddunit, siwa lhawiyya, d wurar. D axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, ay d amuddir, lemmer eoin
Mara rekben di lbabuo, ad naaoen Oebbi, d idiniyen zeddigen $uoeS. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, atnan la pcaraken
Ad nekoen ayen i sen Nefka, ad zhun, deqqal ad eoen
Day ur walan ara, Nerra loamaa n laman, wanag la pwaxvafen imdanen i sen d izzin? Day ad amnen di tkerkas, u ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Anwa i idensen kteo: win id isnulfan tikerkas af Oebbi, ne$ win irran tidep d tikerkas, mi t id tusa? Day macci d Loahennama ay d tanezdu$t i ijehliyen
Wid ijuhden ar loiha nne£, a ten Nenhu, war ccekk, s iberdan nne£. Ih, Oebbi Ippili ar lauuam
